title: NOREL — NOn RELay on Paper
description: AI-powered, paperless identity sharing system using NFC/QR for tap-to-fill forms. Enables secure, offline-capable form automation in public services with smart form builder and real-time processing.

title: Miralen — Inclusive Learning Platform
description: An inclusive learning platform for the deaf, blind, and mute community using Morse code, visuals, and vibrations. Empowers users with multi-sensory interaction for accessible education.

title: Ravelion AI — Video Background Removal
description: AI-powered video processing tool featuring intelligent background removal, object segmentation, and real-time video editing capabilities with GPU-accelerated processing.

title: Novira AI — Wireframe to Code
description: Converts wireframes and design mockups into production-ready code. Uses AI to analyze visual layouts and generate responsive HTML/CSS/React components automatically.

title: Mood Maze — Puzzle Game
description: Interactive puzzle game with mood-matching logic where players escape a maze by solving emotional challenges. Features dynamic difficulty scaling and beautiful visual effects.

title: FocusFlow — Productivity App
description: A note and task productivity app with dynamic task views, state management, and pomodoro timer integration. Helps users stay organized and focused.

title: LegalDoc AI — Legal Document Assistant
description: AI-powered legal document analysis and generation tool. Assists in drafting, reviewing, and understanding legal documents with natural language processing.

title: Formcraft AI — Smart Form Builder
description: Auto-generating forms using AI prompts with an intelligent UI. Create complex forms through natural language descriptions and export production-ready code.
